words.source: H6437 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of פָּנָה 'to turn'; KJV 'turned', ESV 'turned', NASB 'turned'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H935 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of בּוֹא 'to come, go'; KJV 'and went', ESV 'and went', NASB 'and went'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; KJV 'into', ESV 'into', NASB 'into'
H1004 n.ms constr. + 3ms suff. בַּיִת 'house'; KJV 'his house', ESV 'his house', NASB 'his house'
H3808 conj. + neg. particle לֹא 'not'; KJV 'neither did he', ESV 'he did not', NASB 'he did not'
H7896 Qal perf. 3ms of שִׁית 'to set, put'; KJV 'set', ESV 'take even', NASB 'take even'
H3820 n.ms constr. + 3ms suff. לֵב 'heart'; KJV 'his heart', ESV 'this to heart', NASB 'this to heart'
H1571 adv. גַּם 'also, even'; KJV 'neither', ESV 'even', NASB 'even'
H2063 prep. l- + dem. pron. fs זֹאת 'this'; KJV 'to this', ESV 'to this', NASB 'to this'
